equipment.name: Mark of Bequirel
equipment.body:
An adventurer falls at some point in their life, whether it be to a blade or disease. It's commonly whispered that occasionally, those who meet an untimely fate will be saved, earning his marking in the process.

Upon obtaining the Mark of Bequirel, you are given one of the following abilities of the GM's choice:
Life of the Wind. You no longer take damage falling from great heights.
Life of the Fire. You gain resistance to Fire damage equal to half your level.
Life of the Water. You no longer need to eat or drink.
Life of the Earth. You can no longer be knocked prone.
